beer.beer_description:
Volfas Engelman Bravoro pinta – pirmoji Lietuvoje pinta stiklo butelyje. Ne tik savo ūgiu ir formų elegantiškumu ji išskirtinė esti. Unikali šio alaus ketverto rūšių apynių kompozicija: išauginti Vokietijos ir Čekijos žemėse tauraus aromato Saaz, aromatiniai Hallertauer Mittelfrüh, kartieji Hallertauer Magnum ir Hallertauer Taurus. Dėl jų šis alus toks ypatus, kad net didžiausialaus žinovai jam kepures kelia. Dar vienas išskirtinumas, kad pirkdami šį alų, kaip ir kitas Volfas Engelman rūšis, visada galite matyti ir rinktis jį šviežią, nes etiketėje žymima ne tik galiojimo, bet ir pagaminimo data. Dabar ir pintos talpos skardinėje.

Volfas Engelman Brewery Pint is the first pint in Lithuania in a glass bottle. It is exclusive not only by its height and elegancy of forms. The composition of this beer four sorts hops is unique: grown in Germany’s and Czechia’s lands Saaz of noble aroma, the aromatic Hallertauer Mittelfrüh, the bitter Hallertauer Magnum and Hallertauer Taurus. Due to it this beer is so special that the biggest connoisseurs of beer raise hats to it. There is one more exclusive fact: when purchasing this beer just as the other sorts of Volfas Engelman you can always see and choose it fresh, as in the label both the production and the best before dates are indicated. Now in a tin of pint volume as well.

Volfas Engelman Bravoro pinta – pirmoji Lietuvoje pinta stiklo butelyje. Ne tik savo ūgiu ir formų elegantiškumu ji išskirtinė esti. items.badge_description: We love lagers! Crisp, clean, cold fermenting, these beers are a labor of love. Whether a dark Dunkel, a malty amber, or a light helles, lagers never fail us. So on Lager Day, join us in a toast to the humble lager.
Your quest to quench your thirst leaves no stone unturned! That's at least 15 distinct venues!
You're exploring this great country the best way possible, one delicious beer at a time! That's one beer while in at least 10 states or countries. Visit 5 more for Level 3!

Fresh from the tap is one of the best ways to enjoy a beer. Just try to use a glass and not drink directly from the tap, as tempting as it may be. That's 30 checkins with the serving style of Draft. Try 5 more for Level 7!

items.checkin_comment: 2023 ГОД. 6,5/10. 3,25/5. Средненький светлый лагер. Не смотря на целых четыре сорта хмеля: Saaz (Жатецкий), Hallertauer Mittelfrüh, Hallertauer Magnum, Hallertauer Taurus.

items.checkin_comment: May '20. Canned, 568ml from the Grosik Euro Supermarket, Banbury.

items.badge_description: One cannot live on dank hops alone. Tone down the bitterness and enjoy some smooth flavor. That's 470 different beers with an IBU of 20 or below.  Try 5 more for Level 95!

items.badge_description: After a long day, what better way to kick back than with a crisp and refreshing lager? You're already feeling more relaxed, aren’t you?. That’s 260 different Lagers! Try 5 more for Level 53!

With its own unique brewing traditions and high per capita beer consumption, Lithuania's breweries have plenty to offer! That's 5 different beers from a brewery from Lithuania. Try 5 more for Level 2!

Volfas Engelman Brewery Pint is the first pint in Lithuania in a glass bottle. It is exclusive not only by its height and elegancy of forms. The composition of this beer four sorts hops is unique: grown in Germany’s and Czechia’s lands Saaz of noble aroma, the aromatic Hallertauer Mittelfrüh, the bitter Hallertauer Magnum and Hallertauer Taurus. Due to it this beer is so special that the biggest connoisseurs of beer raise hats to it. There is one more exclusive fact: when purchasing this beer just as the other sorts of Volfas Engelman you can always see and choose it fresh, as in the label both the production and the best before dates are indicated. Now in a tin of pint volume as well.
